page_analysis.text_content:
Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

• Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.

• Maximum width (interior dimension) is 3'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

• Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).

• Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

• Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.

• Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

Interior lot example

Rear yard

Buildable area

3' max width

Main dwelling

3' max. width

3' min. from lot line (Typ.)

3' max. into side yard (Typ.)

Front yard

Lightwells & stairwells
• a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
• a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement

Note: measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.

visual_elements.description: Site plan diagram illustrating an interior lot example with labeled areas: Rear yard, Front yard, Interior side yard. The diagram shows a 'Buildable area' shaded in light gray, with a 'Main dwelling' shaded in darker gray. Various dimensions are marked including '3' max width' for light wells and stairwells, '3' min. from lot line (Typ.)', and '3' max. into side yard (Typ.)'. The diagram includes arrows and labels for dimensions a, b, c, and d representing different encroaching features. A key explains line types and shading: solid line for curb, dashed line for lot line, shaded blocks for sidewalk, dashed area for required setbacks, light gray for buildable area, dark gray for dwelling, and white for lightwells & stairwells that encroach into required yards.
visual_elements.location: Right side, occupying approximately the middle to bottom half of the page
